stimulusHtml: A particle moves along a straight line so that at time t > 0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG0bGaeyOpa4JaaGimaaaa@3BB6@ the position of the particle is given by s ( t ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CB4@ , the velocity is given by v ( t ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CB7@ , and the acceleration is given by a ( t ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CA2@ . Which of the following expressions gives the average velocity of the particle on the interval [ 2 , 8 ] MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F06@ ?
choicesHtml: 1 6 ∫ 2 8 a ( t )   d t MathType@MTEF@5@5@@44FE@

1 6 ∫ 2 8 s ( t )   d t MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4510@

s ( 8 ) − s ( 2 ) 6 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@41D4@
